Apos.​Input.​KeyboardCondition
Apos.​Input.​ICondition
public
Apos.​Input.​KeyboardCondition

Checks various conditions on a specific keyboard key.  Non static methods implicitly make sure that the game is active. Otherwise returns false.

Constructors
KeyboardCondition
public KeyboardCondition(
Keys key
)
Parameter
key
Keys

The key to operate on.

Public Functions
Pressed
public bool Pressed()
Returns

Returns true when the key was not pressed and is now pressed.

Held
public bool Held()
Returns

Returns true when the key is now pressed.

HeldOnly
public bool HeldOnly()
Returns

Returns true when the key was pressed and is now pressed.

Released
public bool Released()
Returns

Returns true when the key was pressed and is now not pressed.

Static Functions
Pressed
public static bool Pressed(
Keys key
)
Returns

Returns true when the key was released and is now pressed.

Held
public static bool Held(
Keys key
)
Returns

Returns true when the key is now pressed.

HeldOnly
public static bool HeldOnly(
Keys key
)
Returns

Returns true when the key was pressed and is now pressed.

Released
public static bool Released(
Keys key
)
Returns

Returns true when the key was pressed and is now released.

The key that will be checked.
